## Description

Describe the purpose of this pull request and summarize the changes made.
Example: Implemented the /api/session endpoint and updated the OpenAPI specification.

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of Change

Mark the relevant options with an "x".

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (changes that could affect existing functionality)
- [ ] Code cleanup or refactor
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other (please describe):

---

## Testing

Describe how you tested your changes.

- [ ] Tested locally with `go run main.go`
- [ ] Verified using Postman or curl
- [ ] Docker build and run verified (`docker compose up`)
- [ ] Simulator tested
- [ ] Other (please specify):

## Notes for Reviewers

Include any additional details reviewers should know about this change.

---

## Checklist

Before requesting review, ensure the following:

- [ ] Code builds and runs without errors
- [ ] OpenAPI specification is updated if endpoints changed
- [ ] Documentation is updated (README, comments, etc.)
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive data are included
